You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &esim;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Esim;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2a73/index.htm U+02A73].
  * `&esim;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2242/index.htm U+02242].
